title: Forecast CAGR global digital health market by major segment 2015 to 2020
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 for 5 number of Names.
Name Mobile health has the highest Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 and EHR/EMR has the lowest Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020.
The highest value at Name Mobile health is 10.25x times more than the lowest value at EHR/EMR.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 in the y axis.
The maximum Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 41.0 is found at Name Mobile health and the minimum is found at EHR/EMR where Name is 4.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 for 5 number of Names.
Name Mobile health has the highest Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 and EHR/EMR has the lowest Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020.
The highest value at Name Mobile health is 10.25x times more than the lowest value at EHR/EMR.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Name in the x axis and Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 in the y axis.
The Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 is highest at Name Mobile health and lowest at Name EHR/EMR.
The difference of Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020 between the highest and lowest Name is 37.0.
The Name Mobile health has the highest Compound annual growth rate 2015-2020, followed by Wireless health, and Average. Down to the Name EHR/EMR which is the lowest.
The lowest value 4.0 at EHR/EMR is almost 1.97 times smaller than the average value 20.8.
Summing up the values of all Names, we get total 104.0.
